repository.description:
HMS-OPS is a comprehensive toolkit for managing deployments of CodifyHQ projects using either:
1. Laravel Forge API for production deployments
2. Direct AWS CLI for QA, test, and production environments

work_items.description: Add integration tests for HMS-OPS with HMS-DEV, HMS-SYS, HMS-DOC
suggested_actions: Develop integration tests for HMS-OPS with its integration points
Set up test fixtures for integration testing
Add CI configuration for integration tests
